title: Sociological Theory - Domesticating Danger: Coping Codes and Symbolic Security amid Violent Organized Crime in Mexico
itunes:title: Sociological Theory - Domesticating Danger: Coping Codes and Symbolic Security amid Violent Organized Crime in Mexico
description: Author Ana Villarreal discusses her article, "Domesticating Danger: Coping Codes and Symbolic Security amid Violent Organized Crime in Mexico," published in the December 2021 issue of Sociological Theory.
